name: Skitcher
description:
Being a skater I sometimes find myself in difficult situations. Like, on a highway, surrounded by crazy drivers. As my father taught me, in heavy traffic one must match the speed with it, even if it's uncomfortable...

Be a skater, collect coins, avoid traffic and, most importantly, maintain your speed.

Known bugs:

  • Cars and coins spawn chaotically, sometimes in unreachable spots.
  • Buggy animation on restart.
  • Skater can move cars.
  • On low speed cars can drive backwards.

Credits:

  • syudzius — all the art;
  • yngvarr — all the code.
